cards.title: Sport picture of the day / A Tweet for Novak Djokovic

item.title: Sport picture of the day: A tweet for Novak Djokovic
item.trailText: Novak Djokovic talks to a bird during his game with Phillip Kohlschreiber
item.standFirst: Novak Djokovic talks to a small bird on Centre Court during his match with Phillip Kohlschreiber during day one of the Wimbledon tennis championships at the All England Lawn Tennis Club
